Hero.title: Tanya Arbuz
Hero.description: I build scalable and modular systems with a keen focus on architecture, clean code, and iterative delivery. I take full ownership of challenges to deliver results, continuously seeking ways to enhance product and engineering processes, and transforming complex problems into robust, effective solutions.

AboutMe.leftSubtitle: A warrior doesn't boast — he simply knows what he's capable of.
AboutMe.description1: <highlight>Frontend Engineer</highlight> with <highlight>5 years of commercial experience</highlight> in web development. I design scalable client-side applications using <highlight>React</highlight>  and <highlight>Next.js (App Router, TypeScript)</highlight>, focusing on <highlight>architecture (Feature-Sliced Design)</highlight>, UX, and performance <highlight>(SSR/ISR)</highlight>. My background in <secondary>backend (NestJS, Laravel)</secondary> and <secondary>DevOps (Docker)</secondary> provides a holistic view of the product, enabling me to build efficient end-to-end integrations and scalable solutions.
AboutMe.description2: I prioritize core architectural reliability, exceptional user experience (UX), and the automation of manual processes. I am driven by continuous learning, value colleague input, and focus on delivering solutions that create <secondary>tangible value for both the business and the team</secondary>.

TechnicalSkills.leftSubtitle: Tools in the hands of a master become an extension of his will.

Experience.leftSubtitle: Every line of code bears the mark of battle. Every project — a new victory.

contract.description: Architected and implemented a headless setup using Next.js App Router and Payload CMS v3, eliminating request cascades. Configured ISR and tag-based cache invalidation (revalidateTag) via Tag Planner to automate content refresh. Built a modular page-loading system with declarative content management.
contract.resultDescription: Automated the management of ad campaigns, reducing human error and saving users time through streamlined control and faster workflows.

cpabox.about: SaaS platform for traffic arbitrage automation
cpabox.description: Designed the frontend architecture ensuring API and UX consistency across components. Integrated Zustand for state management and simplified data flow between modules. Developed and optimized an analytics dashboard (ApexCharts) with Keitaro API integration. Built a Telegram Web App and backend (NestJS) for WHOIS tracking and data sync. Refactored MUI components and theme system to improve maintainability and consistency.
cpabox.resultDescription: Delivered ready-to-use solutions that simplified user data management and made client services more stable and user-friendly.

remotza.description: Developed REST APIs and integrations in Laravel. Collaborated with the UI team on Vue.js components. Optimized data structures and caching (PostgreSQL, Redis) to improve reliability and speed.
remotza.resultDescription: Delivered production-ready integrations that simplified data management and enhanced product stability for client services.

aopsrm.about: An NGO assisting ostomy patients in Moldova
aopsrm.description: Designed and built a custom CMS (Laravel + React) for multilingual content management.  Configured CI/CD pipelines with GitLab and Docker for predictable releases.
aopsrm.resultDescription: Delivered a fully functional website with a turnkey CMS — from design to deployment — enabling the organization to manage content independently and communicate with their audience effectively.
